title: You Wont believe how rare these icons are!
body:
Icons!
we love'em, they give a face to a otherwise faceless player at the other end of the screen.
from an assortment of cute lil furry critters to the hard malicious grin on a chibi tahm kench; we all use them.
and its nice to see riot bringing us more choices to pick from with every event, but here is the issue:
there are to many. 

and well not all of them get used. which means they are a waste of space. and I'm sure papa riot doesn't like seeing good content go to waste, so i propose an idea. one to help revive some dead content.

Badges!
yup thats right badges, let us pin specific icons to our player profile. not only does it let us show off our cool icons we have collected; but it can also work as a sort of achievement system. it could let you advertise what champions you play, what daring feat you have accomplished, maybe just to add a bit of pizzazzz to your otherwise dry player profile.

for riot it could mean you slow down on more commercial icons like lcs icons for specific teams, instead they could be replaced with a team badge, that not only lets players still have thier favourite icon present but also show off their team flair!. I recon 3 pins on the profile page would be sufficient enough to accomplish all this and possibly more.

P.s not sorry for click bait ;)
